pesterlog:

PCG: I MEAN MY NORMAL JACK. NOT PSYCHOPATH OMNIPOJACK.

?GG: jack is just...

PCG: I DON'T LIKE THIS A FUCKING BIT, IT MAKES ME REALLY NERVOUS.
